name: Warp Field
description:
Play as the commander of the Battleship Warpfield, fighting against waves of C.R.E.E.P.'s in this 2d card game.

Contribution to the: Brackeys Jam 2020.2 (Theme "Rewind")

Instructions:

- Play your cards right to defeat the waves of enemies and survive.
- Each turn, you can either play the leftmost available card (command), skip to the next one, or rewind to any available action.
- Whatever you choose has consequences: When you play a command, the enemies fire at you, when you skip they spawn in greater numbers, and when you rewind they increase in strength.
- fight your way to victory. Good Luck commander!

Team : 

Pavle Ilijasevic -Game Design

Zeljko Glumac - Technical artist

Vuk Dragicevic - Art

Fedja Stamenkovic - UI/UX

Goran Damjanovic - Developer

Djordje Mladenovic - Developer
